title: Coupchella Night 2 Recap, Nobody’s Favorite Best Selling Author 06.14.22
itunes:title: Coupchella Night 2 Recap, Nobody’s Favorite Best Selling Author 06.14.22
description:
In episode 1268, Jack and Miles are joined by writer, comedian, and graphic designer Steven Wilber, to discuss… Coupchella Night 2, James Patterson Sucks and more!

  1. Coupchella Night 2
  2. Ex-Trump campaign manager will miss Jan. 6 hearing for family emergency
  3. James Patterson Sucks
  4. 'Dreams do still come true' in a new novel by Dolly Parton and James Patterson
  5. How James Patterson, the richest writer in the world, helped create the iconic Toys R Us jingle
  6. James Patterson mostly doesn’t write his books. And his new readers mostly don’t read — yet.
  7. Inside the fiction factory
  8. How James Patterson Became the World’s Best-Selling Author
  9. James Patterson calls off his fictional Murder of Stephen King

LISTEN: Canario by Karen y Los Remedios

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
